title: Permabans being lifted on January ?
body:
So I just heard a rumour about permabanned accounts having the bans lifted to evaluate reforming.
Is that "20 level" system re-applied?

replies.body: That would be news to me.
He's probably referring to what they were saying about revisiting their "player" bans (tyler1 etc.). Lots of people confuse those with a typical account ban :/
How would you know? Are you some kind of Riot employee or something? :^)
Looks like a fake to me :)

You probably misunderstood what's going on with Tyler1. Apparently, Riot has agreed to lift the indefinite ban - which is different from a permaban - as long as he met certain criteria:

* He listed all the accounts he's been playing on.
* A Riot review of those accounts in January revealed no toxicity.

Even is the indefinite ban is lifted, he's not getting any of the permabanned accounts back.

ARE you kidding have you seen his streams he is the angriest most toxic streamer in league, he always shouts always swears always his teams fault ?

Unreal his ban is getting lifted.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeus1590,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ye36Ogvd,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-11-21T02:37:54.128+0000)
>
> Our prayers have been answered

SAD SMURF IS SAD 
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/34430706
why the downvotes? he just asked a question

#becausecommunity
All these triggered people by a simple question are roaming the summoners rift freely while I'm banned .
Where did you hear that rumour? seems very unlikely.
